titles.title: Conforming Loan Limit Correction Act

To provide for adjustments to the conforming loan limits for the Federal National Mortgage Association and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation and to the maximum mortgage limit for the single family mortgage insurance program of the Department of Housing and Urban Development that more accurately reflect the changes in housing costs, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 9/12/1996--Introduced. Conforming Loan Limit Correction Act - Amends the National Housing Act and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to revise specified loan limit provisions with respect to the Federal National Mortgage Association, the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation, and the Federal Housing Administration.
